title: Inconsistency in my ping times
body: Hi, just curious if anybody has a quick fix to pings spiking randomly during games? I'm 99% sure it's just in league. I usually sit around 40ms but within the next 10 seconds my ping will go from 40>75>100>40>130>70>50 etc... Any ideas?

replies.body: Random lag spikes and input delays could certainly be a network issue like packet loss, and there are some good resources to know for sure.  As a first step, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
